snippet: A leaked tape of a closed meeting of the private club for actors shows a membership unhappy with day-to-day operations and with the club’s executive director, John Martello.
abstract: Over 100 members of Players Club gather to vote on whether to oust longstanding executive director John Martello; New York-based theater club faces deepening financial shortfalls, lawsuit by its employees, fines by city and state agencies and accusations of gross mismanagement from some of its members.
lead_paragraph: A leaked tape of a closed meeting of the private club for actors shows a membership unhappy with day-to-day operations and with the club’s executive director, John Martello.

headline.seo: Players Club Director Survives an Ouster Vote
headline.main: Players Club Stages a Real-Life Drama Over Whether to Oust Its Director
headline.print_headline: Players Club Stages a Real-Life Drama Over Whether to Oust Its Director
